lines: I'm sorry. You have to be going out with a guy to play this episode. You may try again later.

You are at a New Year's Eve party with the guy you are seeing, your best friend, and her date. Everyone seems to be caught up in the spirit of the holiday. When midnight strikes, you give your boyfriend a nice big hug and a kiss, then
turn around to wish some of your friends a happy New Year.
When you turn around again, you see your boyfriend and your BEST FRIEND stuck together in a liplock.
They both look at you as if you have two heads. Maybe you were overreacting.
Later on that evening you see him with his hand on her leg!
You do a slow burn for the rest of the evening. Later, when your boyfriend tries to cuddle with you, you can:
Your boyfriend can't figure you out. He calls you "moody" and goes home.
Maybe you were just imagining things, right? All is forgiven.
Two weeks later, he dumps you for your best friend. Some friend!
It's New Year's Eve, right? Everyone gets a little "friendly" at midnight.
